title: The eredun lands
text: There once lived a Wizard with unimaginable powers. He was So powerful that he could summon the winds, ice, and fire by his side with just one snap of a finger. He lived before humans, before earth, before time.

section.title: Rarity?
section.content: Rarity is given by complexity. Each have a different unique style that fit into a category, Some more valuable than others!

section.title: How many styles?
section.content: The Eredun is home to 10 new unique Golems Style. each with its own piece, different attributes. Maybe you will find more
